summary:
I botched this Lucario idea, & I thought I’d share what I did wrong & what I had in mind.

My goal was to draw in 3/4 from...
caption:
I botched this Lucario idea, & I thought I’d share what I did wrong & what I had in mind.

My goal was to draw in ¾ from memory. In my head I pictured the fist one way, but when I tried to draw it I realized it would be hard to see his expression (I think.. I could be wrong about this).

Anyway, after I’m done, I go over with a handful of corrections. I know there are tons of things to fix, but right now my goal is to make my next drawing just one step better than the previous:

Lucario

Overall- I’m having a problem with the perspective somehow. Also, there’s a conflict between presentation and perspective.

You can experiment with some of these other angles to see what happens and note the differences.

1. Turn the torso like this to show his side. Also remember to bend at the waist.
2. Show less arm to emphasize perspective.
3. Is this angle too much? It looks dynamic, but there’s not much room for the face. My main sketch is clear and easy to see, but somehow doesn’t feel dynamic enough. For now, don’t change the angle you currently have.
4. I think there’s enough distance… maybe it’s how the legs and feet are turned? Next time, try pointing both feet outward so you can see the inside plane of both feet. I think I should show the top of the feet.
5. Remember to sketch the basic forms. That’ll make the drawing more solid and appealing.
6. I think this is about what I want in terms of perspective and showing the facial features.
7. Show the side of the hip, just like with the torso.
8. In my head, I imagined the arm and fist looking more like 3, but if I do that, the pose isn’t as clear. Maybe I should try another sketch from that perspective?

summary: alola, hex maniac, gym, rotem, and legend!
question: alola, hex maniac, gym, rotem, and legend!
answer:
Alola: Who were your team members in Pokémon Sun/Moon?

I don’t remember my sun and moon team but I do remember my ultra sun and moon team! Primarina, Vikavolt, Talonflame, Palossand, Metagross and Alolan Exeggutor! All of them were shiny uwu

Hex Maniac: What is your favourite ghost type?

I love all the ghost types but my top 2 are Decidueye and Mimikyu

Gym: If you were a gym trainer, what would be your specialist type?

Def a ghost type gym

Rotem: What is your favourite region in Pokémon?

Unova and Alola

Legend: Your favourite legendary/mythical Pokémon?

My favourite Legend is Lugia, and my favourite mythical is Marshadow

uwu

summary: My good buddy @beakmonster drew me a bunch of stuff I requested for my birthday (now passed) First image: Mccree riding a Shiny...
caption:
My good buddy @beakmonster drew me a bunch of stuff I requested for my birthday (now passed)

First image: Mccree riding a Shiny rapidash because favorite things go together like chocolate and milk

Second image: Based on an original design I made back in 2013, this is my original persona Icarus. I have a separate one I made for myself for the universe of Persona 5 but this is and always will be my favorite persona. I asked her to retain a few original elements in my design but the rest was redesigned. I asked her to keep the face, beartrap headphones, jacket wings and scythe claws. Everything else she updated and tied to my aesthetic : )

Third Image: I have a deep dark secret I will tell no one ever, but this image will at least give you a nice hint what it is. Hint Hint wink wink now excuse me while I go change my name and live in the woods.

Fourth image: We took a break during stream and I gave her some head pats and she approved of it so much that she commemorated the moment <3

I actually have more art from her to upload as it comes so enjoy Batch one! :D The second batch will be more animal oriented :)

Follow me on Twitter: @TsunderAnna
Beakmonster is still Beakmonster on Twitter.

title: Cloyster - 91
body:
Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

- Pokemon Fire Red, Y

reblog.comment:

blog.name: pokegodsandmissingno
blog.title: P̵o̵K̸é̴G̸o̸D̷s̸ and Frightful Things to Come?
blog.description: There is a growing desire and expectation of humans here on Earth in making full contact with PoKéMoN who are still unknown. Back in 1995, when I saw my first UPM (Unindexed Pocket Monster), I found out very quickly that other people thought you were totally crazy if you said you saw such things. The world has changed quite a bit since then when I was a child. In fact, in late 1997, a poll taken in Kanto shows that for the first time ever, more than fifty percent of residents now believe in PokéGODS's. Since then, there have been polls that put the figure at over eighty percent or more.

tags: why do i keep getting shiny gengars
title: ~ Ghostly Raffle ~
body:
Every now and then, there is a breath of wind speaking of Fall… The shops are carrying pumpkin decor, back-to-school fashions are in, and it seems everyone is getting the itch for a change of seasons. Even the ghosts are getting restless! But it’s definitely still summer, right? 

  • 1 Like = 1 entry, 1 Reblog = 1 Entry! Max of two entries!
  • This is a raffle! Winner will be generated randomly and without bias
  • Winner must have a copy of SuMo/Ultra SuMo
  • Winner will be announced on Sunday, July 29th, and will receive one shiny Gengar as described below:

Gengar, Ultra Ball, male, lv 76, Gentle, Cursed Body, knows Hypnosis, Shadow Punch, Spite, Mean Look

Winner has 24 hours to respond, 1 week to claim! Good luck!

summary: for the pokemon ask! legend, variant, alola, leaf stone and gym
question: for the pokemon ask! legend, variant, alola, leaf stone and gym
answer:
legend: favorite legendary/mythical pokemon? ahhh that’s so hard for me to pick just one,, it prob be suicune, lugia, rayquaza or lunala! (also mew cuz who doesn’t love mew)

variant: fav regional variant? alolan ninetails definitely

alola: team members in sun/moon? well my first team was decidueye, ash greninja, alolan marowak, mimikyu, alolan raichu, and toucannon. after that it’s been multiple different pokemon lol

Leaf stone: fav grass type? my round borb rowlet

Gym: what type of gym trainer specialist you’d be? ghost! 👻

thank you friend!! uvu
